sentences.en: Different types of foraminifera thrive at different temperatures.
sentences.cn: 不同种类的有孔虫在不同温度下繁殖.

sentences.en: Foraminifera indicate an outer neritic paleobathymetric setting.
sentences.cn: 有孔虫类显示了外围浅海的古代水深.

sentences.en: Globs of mud pulled from the trench have yielded an assortment of bacteria, fungi and primitive single-celled organisms called foraminifera.
sentences.cn: 海沟中提取出的泥中生存着细菌、真菌和叫做有空虫类的原始单细胞有机体。

sentences.en: Looking like a puffy white star studded with little pearls, this is the shell of an amoeboid protist called a foraminifera, or foram.
sentences.cn: 看看这个胀鼓鼓的白色星星，它上面满是珍珠。 这是一类变形虫（属于原生生物）的外壳，这类变形虫被称为有孔虫（ foraminifera or foram）。

sentences.en: This fauna is associated with Foraminifera, sponge spicules and Brachiopoda et al.
sentences.cn: 伴生生物有有孔虫 、 海绵骨针、腕足动物等.
